net.proteusframework.cms.controller

Interface CmsRequestListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CmsRequestContext

    public interface CmsRequestListener
extends EventListener
    Listener to receive notifications of the request/response lifecycle.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Class<? extends CmsRequestListener>> getDependencies()
      Get the listeners this listener depends on being fired before this listener is fired when initializing.
      void requestDestroyed(CmsRequestEvent event)
      Called when the request is to be destroyed.
      void requestInitialized(CmsRequestEvent event)
      Called when the request has been initialized.

    • Method Detail

      • getDependencies

        List<Class<? extends CmsRequestListener>> getDependencies()
        Get the listeners this listener depends on being fired before this listener is fired when initializing. The reserve order is used when destroyed the request.
        Returns:
        List.

      • requestDestroyed

        void requestDestroyed(CmsRequestEvent event)
        Called when the request is to be destroyed.
        Parameters:
        event - the event.

      • requestInitialized

        void requestInitialized(CmsRequestEvent event)
        Called when the request has been initialized.
        Parameters:
        event - the event.
